mapper.sql: id, doctorCode, doctorName, adminType, COMMENTS, STATE, IS_DELETEMARK, MODIFY_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_ID, currencyField,areaType
mapper.select:
SELECT p.id, p.doctorCode, p.doctorName, p.adminType, p.COMMENTS,
1 STATE,
case when p.doctorCode = #{ doctorCode } then 2 else 1 end STATE,
p.IS_DELETEMARK, p.MODIFY_TIME, p.CREATE_TIME, p.CREATE_USER_ID, p.MODIFY_USER_ID, GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(d.deptId,'-',d.deptName)) currencyField, p.areaType FROM yb_appeal_confire p left join yb_appeal_confire_data d on p.id = d.pid where p.IS_DELETEMARK = 1
AND p.areaType = #{ areaType }
and (p.doctorCode like concat('%', #{ doctorContent } ,'%') or p.doctorName like concat('%', #{ doctorContent } ,'%'))
and p.adminType = #{ adminType }
and p.CREATE_USER_ID = #{ uid }
and (p.CREATE_USER_ID = #{ uid } or p.doctorCode=#{ doctorCode })
and p.id in(select DISTINCT pid from yb_appeal_confire_data where deptName like concat('%', #{ deptContent } ,'%'))
GROUP BY p.id order by p.create_time desc
